orthodontics.title: Align Your Smile with Confidence
orthodontics.description: Whether you are considering Invisalign or traditional braces, we offer personalized options based on your goals and diagnosis, so you can smile comfortably and confidently at every stage of treatment.

cards.title: Personalized Treatment Plans
cards.subtitle: Every smile is unique. Our orthodontic care begins with a personalized evaluation and a treatment plan tailored to each patient, requiring X-rays and photographs for a complete, detailed study.

cards.title: Advanced Braces & Invisalign
cards.subtitle: We offer both traditional braces and clear aligners to address spacing, worn teeth, crowding, deep bites, open bites, crossbites, skeletal discrepancies, and preparation for smile design with veneers.

cards.title: Long-Term Oral Health Benefits
cards.subtitle: Orthodontic treatment does more than improve your smile. Properly aligned teeth make daily cleaning easier, reduce the risk of cavities and gum disease, and support long-lasting oral health.

cosmetic-dentistry.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
cosmetic-dentistry.description: Enhance the natural beauty of your smile with our cosmetic dental treatments, including professional whitening, porcelain veneers, aesthetic bonding, and digital smile design. Achieve a harmonious, healthy, radiant appearance with personalized, long-lasting results.

cards.title: Teeth Whitening
cards.subtitle: Brighten your smile with professional whitening treatments that safely and effectively remove stains caused by food, beverages, and aging. Our in-office and at-home options deliver noticeable results with minimal to no sensitivity.

cards.title: Porcelain Veneers
cards.subtitle: Achieve a flawless smile with custom-made porcelain veneers designed to ensure a natural tooth shape and color that won’t change over time. Feel more confident and even rejuvenated with this transformative treatment.

cards.title: Cosmetic Bonding
cards.subtitle: Repair minor imperfections such as chips, gaps, and discolorations using tooth-colored resin that blends seamlessly with your natural enamel. A fast and cost-effective way to improve your smile.

periatric-dentristry.title: Pediatric Dentistry
periatric-dentristry.description: Specialized dental care for children with a friendly, preventive, and empathetic approach.

cards.title: Preventive Dental Checkups
cards.subtitle: We provide regular exams to monitor dental development, detect early cavities, and ensure healthy smiles from a young age. Prevention is key to lifelong oral health.

cards.title: Sealants & Fluoride Treatments
cards.subtitle: We apply dental sealants and fluoride to protect both primary and permanent teeth from cavities. These treatments are safe, quick, and highly effective long-term.

cards.title: Treatment for Cavities & Injuries
cards.subtitle: We treat cavities and common childhood dental injuries using gentle techniques designed specifically for children. Our team is trained to help little ones feel safe and comfortable.

dental-surgery.title: Oral Surgery
dental-surgery.description: Advanced surgical procedures to restore missing teeth, rule out oral pathologies, remove wisdom teeth, or extract teeth that should not remain in the mouth—safely and effectively.

cards.title: Comprehensive Oral Surgeries
cards.subtitle: Our oral surgery services cover a wide range of advanced procedures, including dental implants, wisdom tooth extraction, and corrective jaw surgery to improve breathing, chewing, and overall facial harmony.

cards.title: Emergency Dental Care
cards.subtitle: We provide urgent dental treatments for injuries, infections, and severe tooth pain, offering immediate relief and complete follow-up care.

cards.title: Reconstructive Dentistry
cards.subtitle: Our surgeons, trained at leading universities, restore chewing function and treat facial trauma cases or tissue biopsies. All surgical procedures can be performed under sedation administered by an anesthesiologist.

periodontics.title: Periodontics
periodontics.description: Comprehensive care for gum disease and oral hygiene. When bacterial imbalance and chronic inflammation occur, systemic health can be affected. Our specialists are ready to treat the causes of bad breath, premature tooth or bone loss, and gum recession.

cards.title: Gum Disease Treatments
cards.subtitle: We specialize in diagnosing and treating gum diseases such as gingivitis and periodontitis using advanced, patient-centered techniques that support long-term oral health.

cards.title: Periodontal Surgeries
cards.subtitle: Our periodontal surgeries include gum grafts, pocket reduction procedures due to bone loss, and bone regeneration treatments to strengthen gum structure and support dental implants.

cards.title: Preventive & Maintenance Care
cards.subtitle: We offer personalized maintenance plans that include regular cleanings, deep cleanings, and home-care guidance to support your overall gum health.

endodontics.title: Endodontics
endodontics.description: Specialized treatment to preserve natural teeth through advanced root canal procedures performed with a microscope by our endodontic specialist.

cards.title: Root Canal Treatments
cards.subtitle: We remove infected pulp, clean and seal the canals to relieve pain and save natural teeth, along with the surrounding bone support. We also treat teeth that lose vitality due to trauma.

cards.title: Endodontic Surgeries
cards.subtitle: We perform apicoectomies to treat persistent infections and preserve teeth that do not respond to conventional treatments. Our goal is always to maintain the natural tooth for as long as possible.

cards.title: Preventive & Follow-Up Care
cards.subtitle: We conduct regular clinical and radiographic evaluations, along with oral hygiene education, to prevent pulp disease and maintain long-term dental health.

dental-implants.title: Dental Implants
dental-implants.description: Restore your natural smile and dental functionality.

cards.title: Implant Consultations
cards.subtitle: Our implant consultations include thorough evaluations and personalized treatment plans to determine the best implant solutions for your oral health needs.

cards.title: Implant Placement
cards.subtitle: We use cutting-edge techniques for precise implant placement, ensuring optimal aesthetics, functionality, and long-term success.

cards.title: Implant Restoration
cards.subtitle: From single-tooth replacements to full-mouth restorations, our implant restoration services focus on enhancing your smile’s appearance and restoring natural chewing function.

cleanings.title: Dental Cleanings
cleanings.description: Post-cleaning diagnostics help identify stains, tartar, cavities, cracks, gum inflammation, and more, after removing buildup and plaque.

cards.title: Routine Dental Cleanings
cards.subtitle: Our professional cleanings remove biofilm, tartar, and surface stains to maintain optimal oral health and prevent gum disease. Cleanings are scheduled regularly.

cards.title: Deep Cleaning Treatments
cards.subtitle: We offer deep cleanings with Profijet to remove difficult extrinsic stains, especially in patients who smoke or accumulate additional pigments.

cards.title: Preventive Care Education
cards.subtitle: Our dental team provides personalized education on oral hygiene, dietary recommendations, and home-care routines to support each patient’s long-term well-being.

oral-biopsies.title: Oral Pathology
oral-biopsies.description: Accurate diagnoses and procedures to evaluate abnormalities in oral tissues.

cards.title: Comprehensive Tissue Evaluation
cards.subtitle: We perform detailed exams and biopsies to diagnose oral lesions, ulcers, and suspicious tissue growths, ensuring timely detection and treatment.

cards.title: Biopsy Procedures
cards.subtitle: Our biopsy procedures use safe and precise tissue-sampling techniques to provide accurate pathology reports and guide appropriate treatment plans.

cards.title: Patient Education & Support
cards.subtitle: We prioritize patient education, offering clear explanations of biopsy procedures, result interpretation, and ongoing support throughout the diagnostic process.

botox.title: Do You Grind Your Teeth?
botox.description: Bruxism is a condition, not a disease. There are many causes behind it, which is why a complete guided evaluation can help you control it and prevent long-term consequences.

cards.title: Targeted Jaw Muscle Relaxation
cards.subtitle: One treatment option for bruxism, depending on the diagnosis, is the application of botulinum toxin ("Botox"). This reduces involuntary grinding and clenching, providing relief and preventing dental damage. Patients often experience less fatigue and improved sleep, along with enhanced facial contouring.

cards.title: Night Guards
cards.subtitle: A precise, custom-made night guard significantly reduces the risk of fractures and dental wear, preventing costly rehabilitations and improving sleep quality.

cards.title: Orthodontics & Oral Rehabilitation
cards.subtitle: Correcting your bite is, in many cases, a fundamental part of treating grinding and dental wear. Let us evaluate your case with one or more specialists, as interdisciplinary care often provides the most balanced and effective results.
